content.rendered:
About the Program:

This program is completely hands-on oriented and designed to help students become Linux Systems Administrator, DevOps Engineer and AWS Admin. It will provide you with an in-depth knowledge of Linux/Unix concepts, Amazon web services (AWS), software development life cycle (SDLC), Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Terraform and Terragrunt, bash scripting, Python scripting, and various DevOps tools including Git, Git-crypt, Bitbucket, Jenkins, Maven, Docker, Helm, Docker-Swarm, Ansible, Kubernetes or K8s, Valero, Grafana, Prometheus, Splunk and etc.

Why the need for this course you might ask?

This course will provide you the skill set needed to start or continue your career in DevOps, Linux, AWS roles and be able to position yourself in any company as a DevOps Engineer, Platform Engineer, Cloud Support Engineer, Linux Admin and etc.

Do I need to have an IT background to partake in this course?

Absolutely not, you do not need to have an IT background to take this course as you will be guided step by step from the beginning through the end. All the necessary information will be provided during the duration of the course. Just need to have the hunger to succeed.

What skills will I attain from this course to get a job in the IT field?

After the completion of this course, you will have the skill set necessary to confidently apply for positions as a DevOps Engineer, Linux/Unix Admin and AWS. The salary for these IT fields ranges from $80k – $180k and more per year.

TESTIMONIALS/REVIEWS

I was told about the quality of teaching this company was giving out there, but when I joined, I couldn’t believe it. The way teaching is done here is wonderful, they always make sure that you understand the material, even if it will take the whole day for them to do so. Also, they will make sure that they interview you, I am talking about real interview here with a panel of three to six interviewers, to make sure you can explain what you are learning, and those interviews are mandatory and not negotiable. I have not seen such in my life so far, I will recommend anyone to join this training if the really want to learn and easily land a job.
Adele
This is one of the best decisions I have ever made as far as my career is concerned. The instructors are very knowledgeable, and very available to help out if you have a blockage (trouble shouting, app problems, etc…) I will definitely recommend this training for anyone willing to make a six-figure job.
Joel
I really enjoy the teaching, very interesting and good topics, the instructors are really dedicated to their program, I would recommend this program to anyone who wants to be successful in the IT world.
Bernislain
EK TECH Software Solution is a great company that used high-level tools like most big corporations. I appreciate the masters who are always available and willing to help every employee to reach their full potential.
Simplice
EK TECH SOFTWARE SOLUTION is a great place to be to dive deeper into those information technology tools for DevOps Engineer and understand them from zero to hero. Instructors are really devoted and ready to extra mile to make sure concepts are understood and that you are satisfied with your learning. At EK Tech Software Solution you are guaranteed to be a successful candidate in the Industry.
Arnaud
The class is Good and really for everyone. Concepts are explained in detail and instructors make sure to answer all questions. Thank you for your time, patience, and determination.
Grace
The class is very great. The explanation is very understandable and the teachers give us all tools to succeed.
Igor moumbe
I usually do not write reviews, but here I am speechless. I feel like I found a second family. I just want to say thank you thank you!!!
Steph
I recently joined EK Tech Software Solution. So far I can testify that it is the best teaching place that I have ever seen. I would definitely recommend anyone looking for success to come and enjoy it.
Barbara
Tout d’abord je tiens à remercier les formateurs pour le gros travail qu’ils font. J’ai commencé la formation sans même connaître la commande de base en Linux (ls). Cependant, avec la magie des explications, de la disponibilité des vidéos, du matériel de formation, des outils de travail ainsi que la possibilité de me joindre au groupe précédent. En à peine 1 mois, j’ai vraiment compris le concept. Effectivement, comme vous l’aurez deviné, cela vient avec un grand lot de travail individuel. Je hâte de voir le fruit de mon travail. Encore Bravo Éric et Tia pour votre dévouement!
Jean-Claude
My friend there is so much to say… Trust me, just sign up follow these guys for less than a year they gonna change your live
Nigieu Christian
If you aren’t aware yet, you have the best devops training out there. I’ve gone through Nana videos, I’ve been through 2 other DevOps trainings offer by Cameroonians like you and I can say without hesitation that you have the best approach/package/teaching technique. People who are still looking for a job may not know that but this devops easy learning training gives more exposure and knowledge than most devops jobs and trainings out there. I am not trying to be nice because it is a fact!!
Pascal T
Shout out to the leaders/managers of this company. This company exposes you to the most relevant DevOps tools and techniques in today IT world. The company is great and the willingness of its leaders to teach, assist and train everyone is second to none! This is a great place to be…carry on!!!
Pascal
The best content and training ever, with a great following-up.
Lydiane
5 stars instructor 5 stars consulting firm 5 star everything I will recommend it
Mullette pokomi
The quality of the content is perfect. The tutors are amazing and go beyond expectations.
Judith
The breakfast Videos are game changer. The teachers are really patient and understanding. They have everything to get you job ready. You only have to follow them
Carine
Good evening Eric, Good evening Tia I hope you are doing great today. I'm taking this moment to say thank you for all the hard work 💪🏾 you are doing for our community, and we can see that the output is ..., fantastic, and ... . Maybe it is the first time in the entire African community. Lots of courages to, please just move on, and always stay together to more perfections.
Collince Takam
Thank you Guys. I just want to say if I did it then you all can do it too. Eric and Tia are really giving us the tools needed to be successful. Please take advantage of the different platforms and if you need additional help, go online search the info and discuss with your colleagues. Practice interview skills in-class or solo by recording yourself. Take the group projects and pipelines seriously. Those would give you jobs. I used to try to memorize things but that did not work for me. I remembered working with S3 group 1 and troubleshooting some issues for hours. I explained those at my latest interview and nailed it. I used to get frustrated fixing or going through issues while working on projects. I realize now that being able to think through the issues and taking notes including the error messages will help you answering questions about t/sing scenarios and demonstrate your thought process. In all cases, I am thankful to EK Tech Management Team and my colleagues. I wish everyone success and I know we will all get to celebrate each other achievements
Nelly
Hello Mr Eric and Mr Tia Just wanna thank you for the knowledge that you've been distilling in the community. I had a task at work to deploy a Kubernetes cluster on Azure. I applied the knowledge that I learned with you guys to achieve the task. Actually, I was the only person in the company who had Kubernetes knowledge. The project went life today successfully. Thank you so much again
Judith
